data.title: Nice place to spend a couple of hours with friends
data.text: Large selection of interesting beer, very good food, tasty, not greasy. Not your usual burgers, fresh flavored buns, thin and crispy fries. Several aioli dipping sauces, fresh salad dressings. The whole menu is a win win. There are no bad choices. Friendly staff, great service. You can spend several hours with friends enjoying cocktails, fine beers, and great food.

data.title: Interesting place, but if you like to smoke this is the place for you
data.text:
Was looking at place down the street, but it was packed, so it was a little late, so this place looked interesting.  Walked in and you could just smell the stale smoke.  I get a seat at the bar and I thought I was going to have to walk out as not only the bartender, but a few servers walked by said nothing and even started a conversation right next to me, before she finally asked me for a drink.

Prices are fine(at least compared to Chicago), the food on the other hand was interesting, they really try to do things different, but pretty flavorless.  I had the mac & Cheese jalapeno popper style and size its meal by itself, but nothing to really write home about.  5 had the patty melt, very thin patty and it was supposed to be sourdough bread, but it wasn't.  The fried were good, stayed warm and had some good amount of salt and pepper on them.

Don't know if the other place was going to be any better, but like the saying goes...You can try anything once, but doesn't mean you need to go back!

data.title: Always a good calm night
data.text: I always seem to have a great and calm night out when I go here. The food and drinks a little pricier than Id like but the poutine is worth it. Wasn't as big of a fan of the chicken fla tbread I got.

data.title: Neat atmosphere
data.text:
We came here to parch out thirst. I tried the Double 0 seven drink. I was not impressed. Not to mention that the waiter kept forgetting my drink orders. 
We did not have any food but the atmosphere is neat so it's worth the trip.

data.title: Good Food, But Smoking Allowed
data.text: Great English Pub feel, I had the KAMIKAZE BURGER made with 1/3lb. Angus patty, crispy ham, grilled jalapenos, pineapple, mozzarella, red onion, bib lettuce, Lin's Bourbon BBQ sauce, it may sound strange, but it was wonderful, l my wife had the SAUTEED MUSHROOM BURGER, Triple cream brie, red onion, bacon jam, arugula, mayo, also very good. The service was great and they have a very good selection of beers. Now for the BAD, they allow SMOKING in the place, we lucked out and only one person in the place was smoking. Would have rated higher if not for the smoking.

data.title: Creative menu, worth a try
data.text: Looks like a bar from the outside but it offers much more than just pub food.  Monte Christo lolly pops were anazing.

data.title: Great food, bar atmosphere
data.text: This place has some great items on the menu but the last time we went, the bar was so smokey smelling that we didn't enjoy the food. If you are ok with a smoking while you eat bar atmosphere, you will enjoy the food, otherwise, be warned.

data.title: Very Good Food
data.text: Food was excellent and they put some unique combinations to flavor the sandwiches and burgers. Flatbread was good. The bacon jam and thick slice of melted brie on my burger were excellent. Service needs some improvement, but food makes it worth the visit.

data.title: Good burger
data.text: I really liked the food, but there was only one waitress and one cook. It took forever to get our food and drinks. Also they can smoke inside which is super gross, and I didn't know. I wouldn't have gone if I had known.

data.title: I was drawn in...
data.text: This bar/restaurant, although I did not eat here, right on the main square in Denton is the closest thing in the Texas that brings to mind a typical Belgian cafe, like the Babbelaar in Aalst or the Damberd in Ghent.  The selection of beers is terrific, the variety of drinks even better, the wait staff is super friendly and the prices are even friendlier.  I am just sorry I did not get the opportunity to try the food because It spread an aroma that was simply out of this world. Next time perhaps, but there is only so many meals one can have in such a short time...

data.title: Reasonableness with an occasional surprise!
data.text: If you like old fashion Kosher Foot Long Dogs, stop by the old Courthouse Loophoke Pub and belly up the the bar, order a cold brew and a foot long chili cheese! Delicious!

data.title: Surprise on the square in Denton
data.text: After shopping in downtown Denton we lucked into this neat little pub for lunch. The staff was attentive and friendly. Choosing from the lunch menu I had the Baja enchilada soup and chicken tacos. The soup was delicious and the tacos were more like a regular dinner order.  My husband couldn't stop raving about the grilled cheese sandwich. The "house" chips are fresh and homemade.  Such a nice surprise and I'm sure we'll go back!

data.title: great pub
data.text: One of the greatest little pubs in all of Texas.  Good food, great beer, great drinks, epic staff and friendly patrons.

data.title: It was a good day for playing pool and darts. Food was average.
data.text: We went on New Year's day for lunch. Very few people there because of the day. We had the pool table and dart board all to ourselves. Very fun with the music they provided. The music was not too loud and they have good beer choices. Enjoyed a couple of drinks. The food was average. All four of usl ordered food that should be served hot, it was lukewarm at best. The house made chips had potential to be good, but again, not served hot. Service was pleasant.

data.title: Take the Time and Stop in
data.text: Awesome little bar on the square in Denton.  We enjoyed several games of darts on our visit.  The mixed drinks weren't killer but okay, the beer was cold.  The food was outstanding.  I had a pecan bacon burger that was truly outstanding and try their home made potato chips, I had the sea salt and vinegar and they were unbelievable.  We also had the appetizer with stuffed jalapeno on top of fried pineapple oh slap your momma good

data.title: New menu not so good
data.text:
Ugh. They changed their menu from cheap decent bar food to over priced below average bar food. 
Everything seems to be cooked in a batter or tempura that has an old taste to it.  It actually caused tummy issues for me all evening. 
Won't be back even though the atmosphere is great.

data.title: Not so much
data.text: This is a college hangout, or after-work hangout. Food is so-so, service is fine but almost always seems understaffed. The last time I was there it was a smoking establishment so it was a 'typical' bar. However, it's a full casual dining menu so many people eat. The interior has so many decades of smoke fog permeating everything in the place that even when it's not busy, the place smells pretty unpleasant....like the clothes you might wear out on a Friday night of drinking, smoking and otherwise having a good time....All this said, it's otherwise a great place to hang out. They welcome large parties and the staff does their best to serve up drinks and food in a timely manner. Just don't go expecting a food experience first - it's not that kind of place. It's a bar first and a restaurant 4th.

data.title: Good lunch
data.text: We had lunch here a couple of days ago.  We enjoyed both the food and the atmosphere.  They had burgers, hot dogs, flat bread pizzas, sandwiches, salads, and some great homemade sauces.  We didn't have anything from the bar, so I can't comment other than the fact that there were some great specials posted and a large selection of craft beers.

data.title: Good bar, just don't go for the food.
data.text: If you are going for drinks and a laid back atmosphere, this is the place.  There are a couple of pool tables upstairs if you want to play a game.  The drinks aren't too expensive and it is usually calm enough that you don't have to yell to be heard.  With that said, there is a reason my friends and I call this bar by it's unflattering nickname "the poop-hole."  The food is not the best. You have been warned!
